name: chat-web
description: Fullstack real-time chat application with Vue 3, Express, Socket.io, MongoDB, and Redis

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test --prefix server" "npm run test --prefix client"
